description.value:
You propel yourself up like a whale breaching the surface of the ocean, then crash back down with thunderous force. @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Leap]. When you land, all opponents within 10 feet of you must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|against:class-spell] save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher, or be knocked @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Prone].

Special If you have the Quick Jump feat, you can @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.High Jump] or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Long Jump] when using Breach.
